alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:20PM EDT until July 30 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles north of Carrabelle, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sopchoppy, Buckhorn, Sanborn, Curtis Mill, Panacea-Wakulla Airport and Mcintyre. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
